DOC.brief_summary: Investigate safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of CP-751,871 when given in combination with carboplatin and paclitaxel in patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Study of CP-751,871 in Combination With Carboplatin and Paclitaxel in Advanced Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of advanced nonsmall cell lung cancer Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1 Any prior treatment for nonsmall cell lung cancer Brain metastases With diabetes
DOC.keyword: CP-751,871, Non-small cell lung cancer, Phase 1
